content: antler toque yummy toque in our favourite cable pattern by tin can knits if you are canadian you know what a toque is sizing baby child adult sm l and for you a toque is an essential accessory to fit 16 18 21 23 head for winter spring and fall too while vancouver materials lacks the sub-zero temperatures of montreal and halifax it is cold dreary and damp for a significant yarn 125 150 175 200 yards worsted / aran portion of the year weight yarn shown in quince and co osprey in is it time for this year s new toque knit this aleutian fox and honey and stone wool classic quick-knitting hat to match your antler cormo worsted in ozark 3 cardigan or antler mittens gauge 18 sts & 24 rounds / 4 in stockinette using larger needles suggest us #6 / 4 mm 16 circular needles us #8 / 5 mm 16 circular and dpns* knit it in the free tin can knits app or as required to meet gauge see only your size *alternatively you can use the magic loop help linked on each instruction technique to knit in the round using a single make notes and tick through long circular needle notions cable needle stitch markers darning needle ravelry cast on antler toque from pacific knits 2 ©
